properties.name: Query
properties.description: The **Query** is an object that provides a chainable interface for making data queries.

Methods.name: aggregate(seed_step_finalize)
Methods.description: Calculates a custom summary for all data items.

Methods.name: aggregate(step)
Methods.description: Calculates a custom summary for all data items.

Methods.name: avg()
Methods.description: Calculates the average of all values. Applies only to numeric arrays.

Methods.name: avg(getter)
Methods.description: Calculates the average of all values found using a [getter].

Methods.name: count()
Methods.description: Calculates the number of data items.

Methods.name: enumerate()
Methods.description: Executes the **Query**. This is an asynchronous alternative to the [toArray()].md '/Documentation/ApiReference/Data_Layer/Query/Methods/#toArray') method.

Methods.name: filter(criteria)
Methods.description: Filters data items using a filter expression.

Methods.name: filter(predicate)
Methods.description: Filters data items using a custom function.

Methods.name: groupBy(getter)
Methods.description: Groups data items by the specified [getter].

Methods.name: max()
Methods.description: Calculates the maximum value. Applies only to numeric arrays.

Methods.name: max(getter)
Methods.description: Calculates the maximum of all values found using a [getter].

Methods.name: min()
Methods.description: Calculates the minimum value. Applies only to numeric arrays.

Methods.name: min(getter)
Methods.description: Calculates the minumum of all values found using a [getter].

Methods.name: select(getter)
Methods.description: Selects individual fields from data objects.

Methods.name: slice(skip_take)
Methods.description: Gets a specified number of data items starting from a given index.

Methods.name: sortBy(getter)
Methods.description: Sorts data items by the specified [getter] in ascending order.

Methods.name: sortBy(getter_desc)
Methods.description: Sorts data items by the specified [getter] in the specified sorting order.

Methods.name: sum()
Methods.description: Calculates the sum of all values.

Methods.name: sum(getter)
Methods.description: Calculates the sum of all values found using a [getter].

Methods.name: thenBy(getter)
Methods.description: Sorts data items by one more [getter] in ascending order.

Methods.name: thenBy(getter_desc)
Methods.description: Sorts data items by one more [getter] in the specified sorting order.

Methods.name: toArray()
Methods.description: Gets data items associated with the **Query**. This is a synchronous alternative to the [enumerate()].md '/Documentation/ApiReference/Data_Layer/Query/Methods/#enumerate') method.
